fieldset.name: section1
fieldset.label: Section 1
fieldset.description: Section 1: Designated National Focal Point, Institution and Implementation Plans - Articles 4, 15

field.name: does_your_country_have_a_designated_national_focal_point_for_the_cartagena_convention_

title.i18n:translate: Does your country have a designated National Focal Point for the Cartagena Convention?

field.title: 1. Does your country have a designated National Focal Point for the Cartagena Convention?

field.name: national_focal_point_name_of_organization
field.title: National Focal Point:Name of Organization

field.name: national_focal_point_contact_person
field.title: National Focal Point:Contact Person

field.name: national_focal_point_job_title
field.title: National Focal Point:Job Title

field.name: national_focal_point_department
field.title: National Focal Point:Department

field.name: national_focal_point_address
field.title: National Focal Point:Address

field.name: national_focal_point_telephone
field.title: National Focal Point:Telephone

field.name: national_focal_point_email
field.title: National Focal Point:Email

field.name: national_focal_point_website
field.title: National Focal Point:Website

field.name: national_agency_ministry_institution
field.title: 2. Does your country have a designated National Agency/Ministry/Institution or other appropriate authority for coordinating the implementation of the Cartagena Convention (Article 15, paragraph 2)?

field.name: national_agency_name_of_organization
field.title: National Agency/Ministry:Name of Organization

field.name: national_agency_contact_person
field.title: National Agency/Ministry:Contact Person

field.name: national_agency_job_title
field.title: National Agency/Ministry:Job Title

field.name: national_agency_department
field.title: National Agency/Ministry:Department

field.name: national_agency_address
field.title: National Agency/Ministry:Address

field.name: national_agency_telephone
field.title: National Agency/Ministry:Telephone

field.name: national_agency_email
field.title: National Agency/Ministry:Email

field.name: national_agency_website
field.title: National Agency/Ministry:Website

field.name: implementation_plans
field.title: 3. Has your country developed an implementation plans(s) to carry out the general obligations of the Cartagena Convention? (Article 4)

field.name: brief_details_of_main_implementation_plans
field.description: If yes or in preparation, please provide brief details of all of the main implementation plan(s) that are developed and/or being used in your country, or that are in preparation.
field.title: Brief details of main implementation plans

field.name: why_no_plans
field.description: If no, please state why not.
field.title: Why no plans

field.name: difficulties_in_the_implementation_of_plan_s_
field.title: 4. Has your country experienced any difficulties in the implementation of the above-mentioned plan(s)?

field.name: why_implementation_difficulties_with_details
field.description: If yes, please describe why with details.
field.title: Why implementation difficulties with details

field.name: has_your_country_recieved_any_external_financial_assistance_to_develop_and_or_implement_existing_plans
field.title: 5. Has your country received any external financial assistance to develop and/or implement existing plan(s)?

fieldset.name: section2
fieldset.label: Section 2
fieldset.description: Section 2: Measures to Reduce Marine Pollution from Ships, Caused by Discharges or Dumping, from Exploration or Exploitation of the Sea-Bed , or from Discharges to the Atmosphere - Articles 5, 6, 8, 9

field.name: national_definitions_for_pollution_sources
field.description: Is there a national definition within existing pollution related legislation or regulations for “Pollution from Ships”, “Discharging or Dumping of wastes at sea”, “Exploration or Exploitation of the Sea-Bed Activities”, and “Discharges (emissions) to the Atmosphere” (Articles 5, 6, 8, 9)?
field.title: National definitions for pollution sources

field.name: management_measures_since_the_last_reporting_period_sources_of_pollution_in_the_convention_area
field.description: Has your country taken any measures since the last reporting period necessary to prevent, reduce and control the abovementioned sources of pollution in the Convention area?
field.title: management measures since the last reporting period sources of pollution in the Convention area

field.name: details_of_pollution_source_management_action_since_last_reporting_period
field.description: If yes or in preparation, please provide the details of the major actions taken since the last reporting period
field.title: details of pollution source management action since last reporting period

field.name: why_no_action_since_last_reporting_period
field.description: If no, briefly state why not.
field.title: Why no action since last reporting period

field.name: other_pollution_sources_or_types_that_may_affect_marine_resources
field.description: Are there any other sources and/or types of pollution that may affect marine resources in the Convention area which require special consideration in your country?
field.title: Other pollution sources or types that may affect marine resources

field.name: text_for_discharges_from_ship
field.description: If yes, please provide the text of the national definitions for discharges from ships
field.title: Text for Discharges from ship

field.name: policies_for_marine_pollution_management_for_special_consideration
field.description: Does your country have any national policies for marine pollution prevention, reduction and control for these activities requiring special consideration?
field.title: National policies for marine pollution management

field.name: policy_website_for_marine_pollution
field.description: If yes, please provide a website or URL reference related to such marine policies.
field.title: Policy website

field.name: laws_for_marine_pollution_management_for_special_consideration
field.description: Does your country have any national laws for marine pollution prevention, reduction and control for these activities requiring special consideration?
field.title: National laws for marine pollution management

field.name: law_website_for_marine_pollution
field.description: If yes, please provide a website or URL reference related to such marine laws.
field.title: Law Website

field.name: plans_for_marine_pollution_management_for_special_consideration
field.description: Does your country have any national plans for marine pollution prevention, reduction and control for these activities requiring special consideration?
field.title: National plans for marine pollution management

field.name: plan_website_for_marine_pollution
field.description: If yes, please provide a website or URL reference related to such marine plans.
field.title: Plan website

fieldset.name: section3
fieldset.label: Section 3
fieldset.description: Section 3: Cooperation in Cases of Emergency – Article 11

field.name: pollution_emergencies_in_the_convention_area
field.description: Has your country experienced any pollution emergencies in the Convention area (including emergencies in which the Convention area is in imminent danger of being polluted or already polluted)?
field.title: Pollution Emergencies in the convention area

field.name: describe_pollution_emergencies
field.description: If yes, please describe the details and answer the question below.
field.title: Describe pollution emergencies

field.name: related_marine_emergency_website
field.description: provide a website or URL reference related to the emergencies
field.title: Related marine emergency website

field.name: response_to_emergencies
field.description: In regards to the question above, did your country respond to the situation through any of the following:
field.title: Response to emergencies

field.name: contracting_parties_and_experience
field.description: If cooperation took place with other Contracting Parties, please specify the name of Contracting Parties you have worked with and briefly describe the experience.
field.title: Contracting parties and experience

field.name: jointly_developed_and_promoted_contingency_plans
field.description: Has your country, jointly with another country or with other countries, developed and promoted any contingency plans for responding to incidents involving pollution or the threat thereof in the Convention area?
field.title: Jointly developed and promoted contingency plans

field.name: technical_guidelines_to_assist_planning_of_major_development_projects
field.description: Does your country currently have any technical and other guidelines (e.g., EIAs) to assist the planning of major development projects in such a way as to prevent or minimize harmful impacts on the Convention Area?
field.title: Technical guidelines to assist planning of major development projects

fieldset.name: section5
fieldset.label: Section 5
fieldset.description: Section 5: Scientific and Technical Cooperation – Article 13

field.name: technical_cooperation_agreements
field.description: Does your country have technical cooperation agreements with any other Contracting Parties relating to the purposes of the Convention?
field.title: Technical cooperation agreements

fieldset.name: section6
fieldset.label: Section 6
fieldset.description: Section 6: Adoption/Amendment of the Convention and its Protocols – Articles 17,18

field.name: status_of_ratification_of_the_existing_protocols
field.description: Please indicate the status of ratification/accession of the existing Protocols to the Cartagena Convention.
field.title: Status of ratification of the existing protocols

field.name: plans_to_propose_amendments_to_the_convention
field.description: Does your country currently have any plan to propose any amendments to the Cartagena Convention?
field.title: Plans to propose amendments to the convention

fieldset.name: section7
fieldset.label: Section 7
fieldset.description: Section 7: The Protocol Concerning Cooperation in Combating Oil Spills in the Wider Caribbean Region

field.name: designated_focal_point_for_the_oil_spills_protocol_
field.description: Does your country have a designated Focal Point for the Oil Spills Protocol?
field.title: Designated Focal Point for the Oil Spills Protocol?

field.name: national_policies_for_management_of_oil_spill_pollution__
field.description: Does your country currently have any national policies for prevention, reduction and control of oil spill pollution?
field.title: national policies for management of oil spill pollution?

field.name: national_laws_for_management_of_oil_spill_pollution
field.description: Does your country currently have any national laws for prevention, reduction and control of oil spill pollution?
field.title: national laws for management of oil spill pollution

field.name: national_plans_for_management_of_oil_spill_pollution
field.description: Does your country currently have any national plans for prevention, reduction and control of oil spill pollution?
field.title: national plans for management of oil spill pollution

field.name: national_operational_measures_for_responding_to_oil_spill_incidents
field.description: Has your country established any national operational measures such as establishing national oil spill contingency plans for responding to oil spill incidents (Article 7 of the Oil Spills Protocol)?
field.title: national operational measures for responding to oil spill incidents

field.name: oil_spill_incidents_since_1986
field.description: Has your country experienced any oil-spill incidents since 1986 (Article 1, paragraph 4)?
field.title: oil-spill incidents since 1986

fieldset.name: section8
fieldset.label: Section 8
fieldset.description: Section 8: The Protocol Concerning Specially Protected Areas and Wildlife (SPAW) - Article 4, 10, 11, 20, 21

field.name: designated_focal_point_for_the_spaw_protocol
field.description: Does your country have a designated Focal Point for the SPAW Protocol?
field.title: Designated Focal Point for the SPAW Protocol

field.name: national_policies_for_the_protection_of_wild_flora_and_fauna
field.description: Does your country currently have any national policies, laws, mechanisms or measures for the protection of Wild Flora and Fauna? (Article 10 of the SPAW Protocol)
field.title: national policies for the protection of Wild Flora and Fauna

field.name: national_laws_for_the_protection_of_wild_flora_and_fauna
field.description: national laws for the protection of Wild Flora and Fauna
field.title: national laws for the protection of Wild Flora and Fauna

field.name: national_plans_for_the_protection_of_wild_flora_and_fauna
field.description: Does your country currently have any national plans or measures for the protection of Wild Flora and Fauna? (Article 10 of the SPAW Protocol)
field.title: national plans for the protection of Wild Flora and Fauna

field.name: established_protected_areas_pursuant_to_the_spaw_protocol
field.description: Has your country established any protected areas pursuant to the SPAW Protocol? (Article 4 of the SPAW Protocol)
field.title: established protected areas pursuant to the SPAW Protocol

field.name: identified_all_endangered_threatened_species_within_your_country
field.description: Has your country identified all of the endangered / threatened species listed in Annexes I, II, and III of the SPAW Protocol that are within your country (i.e. within areas over which your country exercises sovereignty, sovereign rights, or jurisdiction)?
field.title: identified all endangered/threatened species within your country

field.name: measures_to_ensure_strict_protection_of_the_endangered_threatened_species
field.description: Has your country taken measures to ensure strict protection of the endangered/threatened species listed in Annexes I and II (Article 11.1(a) and 11.1(b) of the SPAW Protocol)?
field.title: measures to ensure strict protection of the endangered/threatened species

field.name: plans_for_the_management_of_endangered_threatened_species
field.description: Has your country formulated, adopted, and implemented any plans for the management and use of species listed in Annex III (Article 11.1 (c) of the SPAW Protocol)?
field.title: Plans for the management of endangered/threatened species

field.name: exemptions_to_species_protection
field.description: Has your country adopted exemptions to species protection (Articles 11.2 and 14 of the SPAW Protocol)?
field.title: Exemptions to species protection

field.name: changes_in_the_delimitation_of_protected_areas_or_to_changes_in_their_status
field.description: Did your country proceed to any changes in the delimitation of protected areas and/or to changes in their status (Article 15 of the SPAW Protocol)?
field.title: Changes in the delimitation of protected areas or to changes in their status

field.name: common_guidelines_or_criteria_adopted
field.description: Has your country incorporated into its law or policy the common guidelines or criteria adopted under Article 21 of the SPAW Protocol?
field.title: common guidelines or criteria adopted

fieldset.name: section9
fieldset.label: Section 9
fieldset.description: Section 9: The Protocol Concerning Pollution from Land-Based Sources (LBS) and Activities - Articles I, III, VI, VII

field.name: designated_focal_point_for_the_lbs_protocol
field.description: Does your country have a designated Focal Point for the LBS Protocol?
field.title: Designated Focal Point for the LBS Protocol

field.name: national_definition_of_pollution_from_land_based_sources_and_activiites
field.description: Is there a national definition of pollution from “Land-based sources and activities” (Article I (d))?
field.title: National definition of pollution from Land-based sources and activiites

field.name: legislation_for_prevention_reduction_and_control_of_pollution_from_land_based_sources
field.description: Does your country currently have any legislation for the prevention, reduction and control pollution from land-based sources in the Convention area (Article III)?
field.title: legislation for prevention reduction and control of pollution from land-based sources

field.name: plans_programs_and_measures_that_meet_objectives_of_the_lbs_protocol
field.description: Has your country developed any implementation plans, programs, and measures to carry out the general terms of [or: meet the objectives of] the LBS Protocol, including National Programmes of Action (NPAs)? (Article III)
field.title: Plans programs and measures that meet objectives of the LBS Protocol

field.name: new_and_or_amended_existing_national_policies__laws__regulations__plans__for_reducing_lbs_pollution
field.description: Has your country developed new and/or amended existing national policies, laws, regulations, plans, for reducing LBS pollution over the reporting period?
field.title: new and/or amended existing national policies, laws, regulations, plans, for reducing LBS pollution

field.name: other_types_and_or_sources_of_lbs_pollution
field.description: Are there any other types and/or sources of LBS pollution other than those listed in Annex I of the LBS Protocol that require special consideration in your country?
field.title: Other types and/or sources of LBS pollution

field.name: environmental_pollution_monitoring_and_assessment_programmes
field.description: Does your country have any existing environmental pollution monitoring and assessment programmes as outlined in LBS Protocol Article VI?
field.title: Environmental pollution monitoring and assessment programmes

field.name: guidelines_concerning_environmental_impact_assessments
field.description: Has your country developed and adopted guidelines concerning environmental impact assessments (EIAs) or has your country generated EIAs consistent with the LBS Protocol, Article VII (2)?
field.title: guidelines concerning environmental impact assessments

field.name: total_annual_estimate_of_pollutant_loads_from_lbs_activities
field.description: Does your country have a total annual estimate of the pollutant loads to the marine environment for LBS activities?
field.title: Total Annual estimate of pollutant loads from LBS activities

field.name: difficulties_in_the_implementation_of_the_lbs_protocol
field.description: Has your country experienced any difficulties in the implementation of the LBS protocol?
field.title: Difficulties in the implementation of the LBS protocol

field.name: major_areas_of_assistance_required_to_implement_protocols
field.description: What are three major areas of assistance required to assist your country in implementing the obligations of the Cartagena Convention and its Protocols.
field.title: Major areas of assistance required to implement protocols
